# Spite (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | Cas |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** *Sympathetic strike.* You can force opponents to take damage they have dealt you. Once per day, you can make a melee touch attack on the target, and deal damage equal to the damage the target dealt to you in the last round, to a maximum of 5 hp per divine caster level you possess.

**Spite Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Bestow Wound (Spell)|Bestow Wound]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Transfer 1 hp/level of wounds to another.

**2** **[[Rage (Spell)|Rage]]****:** Gain +2 to Str and Con, +1 on Will saves, –2 to AC.

**3** **[[Vampiric Touch (Spell)|Vampiric Touch]]****:** Touch deals 1d6/two levels in damage; you gain damage as hp.

**4** **[[Pronouncement of Fate (Spell)|Pronouncement of Fate]]****:** Impose a –4 penalty on an offender’s attacks, damage, saves, and checks; target loses actions.

**5** **[[Fire in the Blood (Spell)|Fire in the Blood]]****:** Your blood becomes a potent corrosive that burns attackers.

**6** **[[Cloak of Hate (Spell)|Cloak of Hate]]****:** Target provokes hostile reactions, takes –10 penalty to [[Diplomacy (Skill)|Diplomacy]] checks.

**7** **[[Pact of Return (Spell)|Pact of Return]]****:** If you die as you predict, you are resurrected instantly.

**8** **[[Mantle of Pure Spite (Spell)|Mantle of Pure Spite]]****:** Gain a cumulative DR 1/— and a cumulative +1 bonus on attacks, damage, and AC each time a foe strikes you.

**9** **[[Imprison Soul (Spell)|Imprison Soul]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Traps soul in a small object; target takes 1d4 Con damage/day.
